amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 119-410 to clarify that direct harm does not include emotional, aesthetic, or recreational harm unaccompanied by a material physical or property harm.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to clarify that direct harm does not include emotional, aesthetic, or recreational harm unaccompanied by a material physical or property harm.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 220 (Roll no. 352).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 220 (Roll no. 352).
